message.content:
cs.NI, cs.GT, cs.SY, cs.DC, cs.IT 

The paper discusses the role of energy in the design of future mobile networks, and proposes the use of energy harvesting hardware to decrease the environmental footprint of 5G technology. This topic falls under the category of computer networks and communications, which is covered by cs.NI. The paper also discusses management techniques for renewable energy sources, which could fall under game theory (cs.GT) or control systems (cs.SY). The limitations of existing solutions are discussed, which could fall under distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC) or information theory (cs.IT). Overall, the paper covers a broad range of topics related to energy sustainable mobile networks, which could be classified under several sub-categories.
